law.catch_line: Prohibition Against Advertising As Benefit Corporation Without Full Compliance With This Chapter
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 238, Sec. 52 effective December 1, 2012. See 2012, 238, Sec. 100.] A business corporation organized under the laws of the commonwealth shall not hold itself out as, advertise itself as, or indicate in any way that it is a benefit corporation unless it was organized under and in full compliance with this chapter.
